column4: Hi, everyone. Can anyone tell me which channel to go to for help with setting up my wireless connection? Thanks!
is it on feisty/edgy/dapper ?
then its the right place to ask
what is the problem you are facing?
Well, I followed the wiki on setting up my wireless, and the light on the laptop which indicates the wireless is on has turned blue, but my router is not picking up anything. I can't connect to it.
what wireless card do you have?
so you are saying that network manager cannot see your wireless network?
on the terminal run iwconfig and pastebin the output
ok wireless card module seems find, next run: iwlist scan and pastebin the output
hm, well type iwlist wlan0 scan
you missed the word scan, type: iwlist wlan0 scan
ok your networks are being detected, lets move to next step, do you see the network icon on the upper right corner?
ok click at it (left click) and see if it shows you your networks?
ok now right click at it and see if wireless networking is checked
ok now goto System -> Administration -> Network
select Wireless Connection and Click Properties button
is "Enable Roaming Mode" checked?
just check it, and close
then click at the network icon (left click) again
and you should see your networks
click at the one you want to connect to
did your wireless network work?
